New Records: Klay Thompson set a franchise record for most three-pointers in a debut
Key Match Events: Luka Doncic had 28 points, 10 rebounds, and eight assists despite shooting 9/25 from the floor and turning it over four times
Dereck Lively II had his first 15/10/5 game in his career with 15 points, 11 rebounds, and six assists
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mavericks controlled the second half to beat the Spurs 120-109
This was the first game of the season for the Mavericks with Luka Doncic and Maxi Kleber at full strength
The center rotation of Lively and Daniel Gafford will be one of the best in the NBA if they stay healthy
Others: Klay Thompson silenced the defense critics with three steals
Austin Veazey, the author of the article, is the Lead Basketball Writer for NoleGameday and editor for MavericksGameday
